name: Quest for Cardthulu
description:
A match 2 game with an RPG twist. Created in 43 hours for MizJam1. 

Instructions are simple. 

  1. Choose a Champion.
  2. Pick two cards. 
  3. Attack when matched.
  4. Get Attacked when you missmatch.
  5. Can you beat CARDTHULU?

This is my first game and I made it in Godot. Thanks for playing! Feedback welcome!
